title: Average Cost of a Date Night in Minnesota
description: Date nights can add up. Here's just how much the average date night costs in Minnesota in 2026.
content:
This Is How Much a Date Night Really Costs in Minnesota

This Is How Much a Date Night Really Costs in Minnesota

- [Share on Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fkrocnews.com%2Fdate-night-really-costs-in-minnesota%2F%3Ftrackback%3Dfbshare_mobile "Share on Facebook")
- [Share on Twitter](http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=This%20Is%20How%20Much%20a%20Date%20Night%20Really%20Costs%20in%20Minnesota%20http%3A%2F%2Fkrocnews.com%2Fdate-night-really-costs-in-minnesota%2F%3Ftrackback%3Dtwitter_mobile%20%40KROCNews "Share on Twitter")

With Valentine's Day around the corner, a question came to mind: How much does a date night in [Minnesota](https://kroc.com/tags/minnesota) actually cost these days? I feel like every time my husband and I go out, it's always over $100, and that's if we're just doing dinner.

I did a bit of Googling, but my search didn't lead me to any recent studies, so I did some extra research to find just how much, on average, Minnesotans are spending on date nights.

**ALSO READ: [The Underrated Best Parts of Winter in Minnesota](https://kroc.com/best-parts-of-winter-minnesota/)**

## How Much is the Average Date Night in Minnesota?

I found [an article from Business Insider](https://www.businessinsider.com/cost-of-dating-in-each-state-2018-9) where they looked at the cost of a date night in each state. However, this came out in 2018. Prices have DRAMATICALLY increased since then.

So here's what I did: I peeked at their number and then figured in inflation to get our final average cost of a date night in Minnesota.

![KROC-AM logo](https://townsquare.media/site/669/files/2026/01/attachment-krocam-social-square.jpg?w=100)

Get our free mobile app

Business Insider's 2018 study defined a date night as dinner for two, a bottle of wine, and tickets to a movie. They found that the average date night in Minnesota costs $109.81.

[According to the website CPI Inflation Calculator](https://www.in2013dollars.com/us/inflation/2018?amount=
